questions.question: What percentage of children aged 3-5 years were enrolled in pre-school education in Timor-Leste as of 2020?
What is the urban-rural disparity in ECCD enrollment rates in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a type of ECCD program available in Timor-Leste?
What is the goal for pre-primary education in Timor-Leste's National Education Strategic Plan?
According to the module, what is the potential return on investment for every $1 invested in ECCD?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of ECCD for national development in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary challenge related to language in ECCD programs in Timor-Leste?
choices: Balancing Tetum, Portuguese, and local languages
questions.answer: Balancing Tetum, Portuguese, and local languages

questions.question: Which health issue is mentioned as significantly affecting child development in Timor-Leste?
What opportunity for ECCD in Timor-Leste is mentioned regarding traditional practices?
choices: Integrating traditional child-rearing practices into formal ECCD programs
Using only traditional practices in ECCD
questions.answer: Integrating traditional child-rearing practices into formal ECCD programs

questions.question: What percentage of Timor-Leste's total population was under 5 years old in 2020?
What was the stunting rate for children under 5 in Timor-Leste in 2020?
What percentage of the total education budget was allocated to pre-primary education in Timor-Leste in 2019?
What was the pupil-teacher ratio in pre-primary education in Timor-Leste in 2019?
What percentage of ECCD teachers in Timor-Leste had the required qualifications in 2018?
What is the Tetum term for Early Childhood Care and Development?
What is the Tetum term for play-based learning?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of ECCD program in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of ECCD initiatives in Timor-Leste?
choices: To prepare children for formal schooling

questions.question: Which age group does ECCD in Timor-Leste primarily focus on?
What role can ECCD centers play in promoting social cohesion in Timor-Leste?
choices: Serve as platforms for community integration
Distribute food to families in need
questions.answer: Serve as platforms for community integration

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a challenge for ECCD in Timor-Leste?
choices: High rates of stunting and malnutrition
Lack of parental interest in education
questions.answer: Lack of parental interest in education

questions.question: What approach does Timor-Leste's National Education Strategic Plan emphasize for ECCD?
What is the significance of the 2015 policy mentioned in the module?
choices: Approval of the Early Childhood Education and Development Policy
Establishment of a national ECCD curriculum
Creation of a separate ministry for ECCD
questions.answer: Approval of the Early Childhood Education and Development Policy

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential long-term benefit of ECCD investment?
What is suggested as a way to address the challenge of limited resources in rural areas?
choices: Relocating rural populations to urban centers
Reducing the scope of ECCD programs

questions.question: Which aspect of child development is particularly affected by high rates of stunting in Timor-Leste?
What is emphasized as crucial for ensuring the effectiveness of ECCD programs in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is described as a strength that can support community-based ECCD initiatives in Timor-Leste?
What is suggested as a way to address the challenge of a multilingual environment in ECCD programs?
choices: Using only English in all ECCD programs
Ignoring local languages in favor of official languages
Developing materials and training in multiple languages
Delaying language education until primary school
questions.answer: Developing materials and training in multiple languages
